# Commercial Licensing

HistoSeg is made available for **noncommercial use** under the **PolyForm Noncommercial 1.0.0** license.
See the `LICENSE` file in this repository for the full terms.

## Commercial use requires a separate license

**Any commercial use requires a separate written commercial license from _SPATHO AB_.**

Examples of commercial use typically include (not exhaustive):

- Using HistoSeg in a **commercial product** (embedded, bundled, or distributed to customers)
- Offering HistoSeg as part of a **paid service**, **SaaS**, hosted platform, or managed pipeline
- Using HistoSeg in **consulting / contract work** where deliverables are produced for a client
- Using HistoSeg inside a **for-profit organization** in a way that supports commercial activity (e.g., revenue-generating R&D or production workflows)
- Redistributing modified versions of HistoSeg for any **profit or financial gain**

If you are unsure whether your intended use is commercial, please contact us.

## Contact (Commercial Licensing)

**SPATHO AB**  
Email: **connect@rna-pathology.com**  
Phone: **+46 70 965 45 28**

To help us respond quickly, please include:

- Your organization name and country
- A short description of the intended use (internal / product / service / redistribution)
- Whether you will distribute the software (and to whom)
- Expected scale (users/seats, deployments, servers, etc.)
- Timeline and any compliance requirements

## Note

This document is provided for convenience and does not modify the license terms.
In case of any conflict, the text in `LICENSE` is authoritative.
